languages.text: "Помимо моей вечной благодарности, шерин?" {n}Джай игриво выгибает бровь.{/n} "Разве не выгоднее иметь в партии фигуру куда более весомую, чем обычная пешка? Одна бумажка — и я смогу расширить свою сеть на дальние от Футфола системы. Мои агенты станут вашими глазами и ушами по всему Простору".

traits.locale_text: "Помимо моей вечной благодарности, шерин?" {n}Джай игриво выгибает бровь.{/n} "Разве не выгоднее иметь в партии фигуру куда более весомую, чем обычная пешка? Одна бумажка — и я смогу расширить свою сеть на дальние от Футфола системы. Мои агенты станут вашими глазами и ушами по всему Простору, а торговая империя фон Валанциус... Пожалуй, сможет пользоваться нашими услугами даже в самых отдаленных уголках сектора".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Besides being in receipt of my eternal gratitude, shereen?" {n}Jae playfully raises a brow.{/n} "Won't it be beneficial to have someone in your retinue with the weight of authority behind them, rather than just another pawn? One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Помимо моей вечной благодарности, шерин?" {n}Джай игриво выгибает бровь.{/n} "Разве не выгоднее иметь в партии фигуру куда более весомую, чем обычная пешка? Одна бумажка — и я смогу расширить свою сеть на дальние от Футфола системы. Мои агенты станут вашими глазами и ушами по всему Простору".

One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."

One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."

One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Besides being in receipt of my eternal gratitude, shereen?" {n}Jae playfully raises a brow.{/n} "Won't it be beneficial to have someone in your retinue with the weight of authority behind them, rather than just another pawn? One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “除了我永远的感激之外吗，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊俏皮地扬起眉毛。{/n}“你的随行人员中会少一位只会听令棋子，多出一位有权有势的人。这对你而言，应该是件很有好处的事情吧？只要有了这张纸，我就可以把我的网络扩展到落脚港之外的星系，而我的代理人会成为你在整个科罗努斯扩区的眼线。”
languages.original_text: "Besides being in receipt of my eternal gratitude, shereen?" {n}Jae playfully raises a brow.{/n} "Won't it be beneficial to have someone in your retinue with the weight of authority behind them, rather than just another pawn? One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “除了我永远的感激之外吗，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊俏皮地扬起眉毛。{/n}“你的随行人员中会少一位只会听令棋子，多出一位有权有势的人。这对你而言，应该是件很有好处的事情吧？只要有了这张纸，我就可以把我的网络扩展到落脚港之外的星系，而我的代理人会成为你在整个科罗努斯扩区的眼线。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Además de mi gratitud eterna, shereen?». {n}Jae levanta una ceja, juguetona.{/n} «¿No le resultará útil tener a alguien en su séquito con el peso de la autoridad a sus espaldas, en lugar de un peón más? Un papelito y podré extender mi red a sistemas muy alejados de Paso. Mis agentes serán sus ojos y oídos por toda la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "Besides being in receipt of my eternal gratitude, shereen?" {n}Jae playfully raises a brow.{/n} "Won't it be beneficial to have someone in your retinue with the weight of authority behind them, rather than just another pawn? One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «¿Además de mi gratitud eterna, shereen?». {n}Jae levanta una ceja, juguetona.{/n} «¿No le resultará útil tener a alguien en su séquito con el peso de la autoridad a sus espaldas, en lugar de un peón más? Un papelito y podré extender mi red a sistemas muy alejados de Paso. Mis agentes serán sus ojos y oídos por toda la Extensión».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それに、あたしの永遠の感謝を受けられるわよ、シャリーン？」{n}ジェイは面白半分に片眉をつり上げる。{/n}「当局の権威がバックにある奴を仲間に入れてもメリットなんてないわ。むしろただの駒にしかならないでしょう？紙切れとあたしを味方につければ、フットフォールのはるか向こうまでネットワークを広げられるわ。あたしの仲間がエクスパンス中で、陛下の目となり耳となるの」
languages.original_text: "Besides being in receipt of my eternal gratitude, shereen?" {n}Jae playfully raises a brow.{/n} "Won't it be beneficial to have someone in your retinue with the weight of authority behind them, rather than just another pawn? One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、あたしの永遠の感謝を受けられるわよ、シャリーン？」{n}ジェイは面白半分に片眉をつり上げる。{/n}「当局の権威がバックにある奴を仲間に入れてもメリットなんてないわ。むしろただの駒にしかならないでしょう？紙切れとあたしを味方につければ、フットフォールのはるか向こうまでネットワークを広げられるわ。あたしの仲間がエクスパンス中で、陛下の目となり耳となるの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Hormis mon éternelle gratitude, vous voulez dire ? {n}demande Jae en haussant un sourcil d'un air taquin.{/n} Vous avez tout à gagner à avoir dans votre entourage une alliée investie de l'autorité impériale plutôt qu'un énième pion dénué de pouvoir. Avec un simple document, je pourrai étendre mon réseau jusqu'aux confins de la galaxie, par-delà Castel. Mes agents seront vos yeux et vos oreilles à travers l'ensemble des Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "Besides being in receipt of my eternal gratitude, shereen?" {n}Jae playfully raises a brow.{/n} "Won't it be beneficial to have someone in your retinue with the weight of authority behind them, rather than just another pawn? One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Hormis mon éternelle gratitude, vous voulez dire ? {n}demande Jae en haussant un sourcil d'un air taquin.{/n} Vous avez tout à gagner à avoir dans votre entourage une alliée investie de l'autorité impériale plutôt qu'un énième pion dénué de pouvoir. Avec un simple document, je pourrai étendre mon réseau jusqu'aux confins de la galaxie, par-delà Castel. Mes agents seront vos yeux et vos oreilles à travers l'ensemble des Étendues. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr meint außer meiner ewigen Dankbarkeit, Shereen?" {n}Jae hebt verspielt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Wäre es nicht von Vorteil, jemanden in Eurem Gefolge zu haben, der selbst Autorität hat und nicht nur eine Marionette ist? Ein Blatt Papier, und ich kann mein Netzwerk auf Systeme weit jenseits von Footfall erweitern. Meine Agenten werden in der gesamten Ausdehnung Eure Augen und Ohren sein."
languages.original_text: "Besides being in receipt of my eternal gratitude, shereen?" {n}Jae playfully raises a brow.{/n} "Won't it be beneficial to have someone in your retinue with the weight of authority behind them, rather than just another pawn? One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr meint außer meiner ewigen Dankbarkeit, Shereen?" {n}Jae hebt verspielt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Wäre es nicht von Vorteil, jemanden in Eurem Gefolge zu haben, der selbst Autorität hat und nicht nur eine Marionette ist? Ein Blatt Papier, und ich kann mein Netzwerk auf Systeme weit jenseits von Footfall erweitern. Meine Agenten werden in der gesamten Ausdehnung Eure Augen und Ohren sein."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Sana ebediyen minnet duymam dışında mı şirinim?" {n}Jae, şakacı bir şekilde bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Maiyetinde sıradan bir piyondan ziyade gerçekten otoriteye sahip birisinin olması, sana faydalı olmaz mı? Tek bir kâğıt parçası sayesinde ağımı Binliman'ın çok daha ötesindeki sistemlere genişletebileceğim. Casuslarım, Enginlik'te gözün ve kulağın olacak."
languages.original_text: "Besides being in receipt of my eternal gratitude, shereen?" {n}Jae playfully raises a brow.{/n} "Won't it be beneficial to have someone in your retinue with the weight of authority behind them, rather than just another pawn? One slip of paper and I will be able to extend my network to systems far beyond Footfall. My agents will be your eyes and ears throughout the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Sana ebediyen minnet duymam dışında mı şirinim?" {n}Jae, şakacı bir şekilde bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Maiyetinde sıradan bir piyondan ziyade gerçekten otoriteye sahip birisinin olması, sana faydalı olmaz mı? Tek bir kâğıt parçası sayesinde ağımı Binliman'ın çok daha ötesindeki sistemlere genişletebileceğim. Casuslarım, Enginlik'te gözün ve kulağın olacak."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
